members.name: getMyProfile
members.description: Get my profile, if it has been created

members.name: getAgentProfile

parameters.name: agentPubKey
parameters.description: the agent to get the profile for

members.description: Get the profile for the given agent, if they have created it

members.name: getAgentsProfiles

parameters.name: agentPubKeys
parameters.description: the agents to get the profile for

members.description: Get the profiles for the given agent

members.name: searchProfiles

parameters.name: nicknamePrefix
parameters.description: must be of at least 3 characters

members.description: Search profiles that start with nicknamePrefix

members.name: getAllProfiles
members.description: Get the profiles for all the agents in the DHT

members.name: createProfile
members.description: Create my profile

members.name: updateProfile
members.description: Update my profile

members.name: _knownProfilesStore
members.description: Private

members.name: myAgentPubKey
members.description: Static info

members.name: fetchAllProfiles
members.description:
Fetches the profiles for all agents in the DHT

Warning! Can be very slow

members.name: fetchAgentProfile
members.description: Fetches the profile for the given agent

members.name: fetchAgentsProfiles
members.description:
Fetches the profiles for the given agents in the DHT

You can subscribe to knowProfiles to get updated with all the profiles when this call is done

Use this over `fetchAgentProfile` when fetching multiple profiles, as it will be more performant

members.name: fetchMyProfile
members.description:
Fetch my profile

You can subscribe to `myProfile` to get updated with my profile

members.name: searchProfiles

parameters.name: nicknamePrefix
parameters.description: must be of at least 3 characters

members.description: Search the profiles for the agent with nicknames starting with the given nicknamePrefix

members.name: createProfile
members.description:
Create my profile

Note that there is no guarantee on nickname uniqness

members.name: updateProfile
members.description: Update my profile
